Text.Page:
The besharan merchants have trained {@LinkCreature:41#3001#fleshripper orisks} to guard the roads for them. Until we can eliminate them, we can't drive out the merchants.

That's where you come in.
Well done! The besharan merchants' days are numbered.
Remember, we're taking the fight to them. Without the {@LinkCreature:41#3001#fleshripper orisks}, the besharan merchants are vulnerable.
